overview: The story of a town at the mercy of a landscape in transformation; standing on the brink of an encroaching reality, one in which the age-old fears of the inhabitants are being reproduced. A hamlet has survived, perched in a remote location where its children can grow up and the elderly can die and stay there.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

title: No Place is Far Away
